User Guide#

lib‑ela is organised into sub‑packages, each covering a domain of solid mechanics. Start with Getting Started, then explore the specialised guides below.

Getting Started#

If this is your first time using lib‑ela, follow the quick‑start tutorial:

→ Quick‑start guide

Sub‑package Guides#

Sub‑package

Description & Guide

hyperelastic (libela.hyperelastic)

Constitutive energy models and stress solvers. Guide
